profile:
Adanac is dedicated to providing its customers with quality roofing and aluminum gutter services backed by strong workmanship and material warranties! Adanac’s roofing capabilities encompass virtually all forms of steep-slope and flat roofing.

We strive to offer our customers the highest level of customer service in an effort to maintain a strong referral base. In doing this, we have succeeded in becoming one of the lower mainland's premier roofing companies.

 Adanac Roofing Supply and Install IKO, CertainTeed and Malarkey asphalt shingles. Synthetic product we supply and Install Davinci,Enviroshake and all types of metal roofs along with Cedar shakes.

profile: Surlang Roofing Ltd., residential and commercial roofers located on the Surrey / Langley border, serving the entire Lower Mainland.  Specializing in cedar to asphalt conversions and SBS torch-on membranes, with journeyman roofers on staff, Surlang Roofing is able to handle all your residential & commercial new roofing, re-roofing and roof repair needs.

New installations, reroof & repair - asphalt; cedar to cedar, cedar conversions & repairs; ridge cap replacement, clay & concrete tile repairs; installation & repair of rubber membrane gutters; skylight installation & repair; tar & gravel: torch-on (SBS) roofing & repair.

profile:
Thanks for checking us out on HomeStars.  We proudly provide high quality roofs and repairs installed by our friendly, professional team who respect you, your property and your budget. At Kanga Roofing, we aim to provide exceptional customer service because it’s the only way we do business. From being on time and on budget to everything in between, we care about keeping you satisfied and informed throughout the entire process. We are your roofing expert in Greater Vancouver!

******

In a crowded market, you need a roofing company with the expertise you can rely on. Our fully insured, BBB A+ rated business has the technical experience and customer service background you need. With over 20 years of industry experience, our Lead Foreman, Dan, has seen it all! He is a leak detection expert and is skilled with all aspects of roof repairs, replacements and related work. He will be pleased to answer any questions you have about our services in Vancouver and surrounding areas including Richmond, Surrey, Burnaby, Maple Ridge, Langley and Coquitlam.

******

We take our work seriously by providing you with a plain language, well-executed plan. For total clarity, our warranty information is stated in all of our estimates and invoices. Upon project completion you are given a signed written warranty, a copy of our terms and conditions and pre-filled paperwork on any applicable product warranty. If you are looking for reputable BBB accredited roofing contractors that will provide quality workmanship with a smile, please contact us for a free quote on your commercial or residential project.
services:
ROOF REPLACEMENTS AND REPAIRS:
***
Cedar shingles/
Asphalt/
Fiberglass shingles/
Flat roofs/
Tile roofs/
Metal roofs/
Roof Upgrades
***
ADDITIONS, REPLACEMENTS AND REPAIRS:
EPDM gutter/
Skylight installation/
Ventilation/
Fascia board replacement/

***
MAINTENANCE PROGRAM:
Moss and natural debris removal/
Gutter cleaning/
General roof inspection
